snippet: Suicide attacks against a military vehicle left four people dead and wounded three on Monday on the outskirts of Grozny, the capital of Chechnya, in Russia’s volatile North Caucasus region.
abstract: Suicide attacks against a military vehicle leave four people dead and three wounded on the outskirts of Grozny, capital of Chechnya, in Russia’s volatile North Caucasus region.
lead_paragraph: Suicide attacks against a military vehicle left four people dead and wounded three on Monday on the outskirts of Grozny, the capital of Chechnya, in Russia’s volatile North Caucasus region.

headline.main: Russia: Suicide Bombers Strike at Military Unit in Chechnya
headline.print_headline: Russia: Suicide Bombers Strike At Military Unit in Chechnya
